title: My Kisses Have the Taste of a Fruit That Would Melt in Your Heart! . . . You Disdain Me! Farewell! (Mes baisers ont le goût d'un fruit qui se fondrait dans ton coeur! . . . Tu me dédaignes! Adieu!) (plate IV) from La Tentation de Saint-Antoine
medium: Lithograph from an illustrated book with 22 lithographs on chine appliqué and 21 wood engravings (including wrapper and table of plates)
